word: But before that coming, Jesus said, \93This gospel of the kingdom shall be preached in all the world for a witness unto all nations.\94 Matthew 24:14. His kingdom will not come until the good tidings of His grace have been carried to all the earth. Hence, as we give ourselves to God, and win other souls to Him, we hasten the coming of His kingdom. Only those who devote themselves to His service, saying, \93Here am I; send me\94 (Isaiah 6:8), to open blind eyes, to turn men \93from darkness to light and from the power of Satan unto God, that they may receive forgiveness of sins and inheritance among them which are sanctified\94 (Acts 26:18)\97they alone pray in sincerity, \93Thy kingdom come.\94MB 107-109.
